Deprecated API

Contents

  • For Removal
  • Interfaces
  • Classes
  • Fields
  • Methods
  • Constructors
  • For Removal 
    Element Description
    net.minestom.server.adventure.AdventurePacketConvertor.createEntitySoundPacket​(Sound, Entity)
    Use AdventurePacketConvertor.createSoundPacket(Sound, Sound.Emitter)
    net.minestom.server.adventure.AdventureSerializer
    Use MinestomAdventure
    net.minestom.server.adventure.AdventureSerializer.areAnyTranslatable​(Collection<Component>)
    Use ComponentUtils.areAnyTranslatable(Collection)
    net.minestom.server.adventure.AdventureSerializer.AUTOMATIC_COMPONENT_TRANSLATION
    Use MinestomAdventure.AUTOMATIC_COMPONENT_TRANSLATION
    net.minestom.server.adventure.AdventureSerializer.getDefaultLocale()
    Use MinestomAdventure.getDefaultLocale()
    net.minestom.server.adventure.AdventureSerializer.getSerializer()
    The serializer is no longer in use, use the adventure-provided serializers
    net.minestom.server.adventure.AdventureSerializer.getTranslator()
    Use GlobalTranslator.get()
    net.minestom.server.adventure.AdventureSerializer.isTranslatable​(Component)
    Use ComponentUtils.isTranslatable(Component)
    net.minestom.server.adventure.AdventureSerializer.serialize​(Component)
    Use the Adventure serializers directly
    net.minestom.server.adventure.AdventureSerializer.setDefaultLocale​(Locale)
    Use MinestomAdventure.setDefaultLocale(Locale)}
    net.minestom.server.adventure.AdventureSerializer.translate​(Component, Localizable)
    Use Translator.translate(String, Locale)
    net.minestom.server.adventure.AdventureSerializer.translateAndSerialize​(Component, Localizable)
    Use Translator.translate(String, Locale) and the Adventure serializers
    net.minestom.server.event.handler.EventHandler.getEventNode()
    net.minestom.server.ping.ResponseData.getPlayers()
    Use ResponseData.getEntries(). This return value is now unmodifiable and this operation is incredibly costly.
    net.minestom.server.utils.NBTUtils.SNBT_CODEC
    Use MinestomAdventure.NBT_CODEC
    net.minestom.server.utils.time.TimeUnit.TICK
    Please use either TimeUnit.SERVER_TICK or TimeUnit.CLIENT_TICK
  • Interfaces 
    Interface Description
    net.minestom.server.data.DataContainer
    switch to the Tag API instead
    net.minestom.server.event.handler.EventHandler
    net.minestom.server.ping.ResponseDataConsumer
    listen to the ServerListPingEvent instead
  • Classes 
    Class Description
    net.minestom.server.adventure.AdventureSerializer
    Use MinestomAdventure
    net.minestom.server.attribute.Attributes
    use the constants in Attribute
    net.minestom.server.event.player.UpdateTagListEvent
    net.minestom.server.ping.ResponseData.PingPlayer
    See NamedAndIdentified
  • Fields 
    Field Description
    net.minestom.server.adventure.AdventureSerializer.AUTOMATIC_COMPONENT_TRANSLATION
    Use MinestomAdventure.AUTOMATIC_COMPONENT_TRANSLATION
    net.minestom.server.registry.Registries.fluids
    net.minestom.server.utils.NBTUtils.SNBT_CODEC
    Use MinestomAdventure.NBT_CODEC
    net.minestom.server.utils.time.TimeUnit.TICK
    Please use either TimeUnit.SERVER_TICK or TimeUnit.CLIENT_TICK
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    net.minestom.server.adventure.AdventurePacketConvertor.createEntitySoundPacket​(Sound, Entity)
    Use AdventurePacketConvertor.createSoundPacket(Sound, Sound.Emitter)
    net.minestom.server.adventure.AdventureSerializer.areAnyTranslatable​(Collection<Component>)
    Use ComponentUtils.areAnyTranslatable(Collection)
    net.minestom.server.adventure.AdventureSerializer.getDefaultLocale()
    Use MinestomAdventure.getDefaultLocale()
    net.minestom.server.adventure.AdventureSerializer.getSerializer()
    The serializer is no longer in use, use the adventure-provided serializers
    net.minestom.server.adventure.AdventureSerializer.getTranslator()
    Use GlobalTranslator.get()
    net.minestom.server.adventure.AdventureSerializer.isTranslatable​(Component)
    Use ComponentUtils.isTranslatable(Component)
    net.minestom.server.adventure.AdventureSerializer.serialize​(Component)
    Use the Adventure serializers directly
    net.minestom.server.adventure.AdventureSerializer.setDefaultLocale​(Locale)
    Use MinestomAdventure.setDefaultLocale(Locale)}
    net.minestom.server.adventure.AdventureSerializer.setSerializer​(Function<Component, String>)
    The serializer is no longer in use
    net.minestom.server.adventure.AdventureSerializer.translate​(Component, Localizable)
    Use Translator.translate(String, Locale)
    net.minestom.server.adventure.AdventureSerializer.translateAndSerialize​(Component, Localizable)
    Use Translator.translate(String, Locale) and the Adventure serializers
    net.minestom.server.command.builder.arguments.ArgumentString.staticParse​(String)
    use Argument.parse(Argument)
    net.minestom.server.command.builder.arguments.ArgumentType.Entities​(String)
    use ArgumentType.Entity(String)
    net.minestom.server.command.builder.arguments.minecraft.ArgumentBlockState.staticParse​(String)
    use Argument.parse(Argument)
    net.minestom.server.command.builder.arguments.minecraft.ArgumentEntity.staticParse​(String, boolean, boolean)
    use Argument.parse(Argument)
    net.minestom.server.command.builder.arguments.minecraft.ArgumentItemStack.staticParse​(String)
    use Argument.parse(Argument)
    net.minestom.server.data.DataContainer.getData()
    use the tag API https://wiki.minestom.net/feature/tags
    net.minestom.server.data.DataContainer.setData​(Data)
    use the tag API https://wiki.minestom.net/feature/tags
    net.minestom.server.entity.pathfinding.Navigator.setPathPosition​(Point)
    Please use Navigator.setPathTo(Point)
    net.minestom.server.entity.Player.callItemUpdateStateEvent​(boolean, Player.Hand)
    Use Player.callItemUpdateStateEvent(Hand) instead
    net.minestom.server.entity.Player.sendJsonMessage​(String)
    Use Audience.sendMessage(Component)
    net.minestom.server.entity.Player.sendTitleTime​(int, int, int)
    Use Player.showTitle(Title). Note that this will overwrite the existing title. This is expected behavior and will be the case in 1.17.
    net.minestom.server.event.GlobalEventHandler.addEventCallback​(Class<V>, EventCallback<V>)
    use EventNode.addListener(Class, Consumer)
    net.minestom.server.event.handler.EventHandler.addEventCallback​(Class<V>, EventCallback<V>)
    net.minestom.server.event.handler.EventHandler.getEventNode()
    net.minestom.server.inventory.InventoryType.getAdditionalSlot()
    use InventoryType.getSize()
    net.minestom.server.MinecraftServer.getResponseDataConsumer()
    listen to the ServerListPingEvent instead
    net.minestom.server.MinecraftServer.start​(String, int, ResponseDataConsumer)
    use MinecraftServer.start(String, int) and listen to the ServerListPingEvent event instead of ResponseDataConsumer
    net.minestom.server.network.ConnectionManager.getReceivePacketConsumers()
    see PlayerPacketEvent
    net.minestom.server.network.ConnectionManager.getSendPacketConsumers()
    all packet listening methods will ultimately be removed. May or may not work depending on the packet. It is instead recommended to use a proxy, improving scalability and increasing server performance
    net.minestom.server.network.ConnectionManager.onPacketReceive​(ClientPacketConsumer)
    listen to PlayerPacketEvent
    net.minestom.server.network.ConnectionManager.onPacketSend​(ServerPacketConsumer)
    all packet listening methods will ultimately be removed. May or may not work depending on the packet. It is instead recommended to use a proxy, improving scalability and increasing server performance
    net.minestom.server.ping.ResponseData.addPlayer​(Iterable<Player>)
    Use ResponseData.addEntries(Collection)}
    net.minestom.server.ping.ResponseData.build()
    Use ServerListPingType.getPingResponse(ResponseData)
    net.minestom.server.ping.ResponseData.clearPlayers()
    Use ResponseData.clearEntries()
    net.minestom.server.ping.ResponseData.getPlayers()
    Use ResponseData.getEntries(). This return value is now unmodifiable and this operation is incredibly costly.
    net.minestom.server.ping.ResponseData.setDescription​(String)
    Use ResponseData.setDescription(Component)
    net.minestom.server.ping.ResponseData.setName​(String)
    This is named incorrectly, use ResponseData.setVersion(String) instead
    net.minestom.server.scoreboard.Scoreboard.getCreationObjectivePacket​(String, ScoreboardObjectivePacket.Type)
    Use Scoreboard.getCreationObjectivePacket(Component, ScoreboardObjectivePacket.Type)
    net.minestom.server.scoreboard.Sidebar.setTitle​(String)
    Use Sidebar.setTitle(Component)
    net.minestom.server.tag.Tag.Custom​(String, TagSerializer<T>)
    use Tag.Structure(String, TagSerializer) instead
  • Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    net.minestom.server.resourcepack.ResourcePack​(String, String)
    use ResourcePack.optional(String, String).
    net.minestom.server.scoreboard.BelowNameTag​(String, String)
    Use BelowNameTag(String, Component)
    net.minestom.server.scoreboard.Sidebar​(String)
    Use Sidebar(Component)
